title: Pecan and maple pinwheels
description: Light, flaky Danish pastry topped with pecans, maple syrup and a vanilla icing. For this recipe you will need a food processor and a piping bag fitted with a plain nozzle.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz strong white flour, plus extra for dusting
1 large free-range egg, plus one yolk, lightly beaten
1 large free-range egg beaten with 2 tbsp milk
